original_text: There I will meet with you, and from above the mercy seat, from between the two cherubim that are on the ark of the testimony, I will speak with you about all that I will give you in commandment for the people of Israel.
korean_text: 거기서 내가 너와 만나고 속죄소 위 곧 증거궤 위에 있는 두 그룹 사이에서 내가 이스라엘 자손을 위하여 네게 명령할 모든 일을 네게 이르리라

sentences.original_text: There I will meet with you
and from above the mercy seat
that are on the ark of the testimony
about all that I will give you
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너에게 줄 모든 것에 대하여

sentences.original_text: in commandment for the people of Israel
